Title: Lies
Writer: Baran bo Odar (created by), Jantje Friese (created by), Jantje Friese, Ronny Schalk
Actors: Andreas Pietschmann, Louis Hofmann, Karoline Eichhorn, Oliver Masucci
Plot: When a grim discovery leaves the police baffled, Ulrich seeks a search warrant for the power plant. A mysterious stranger checks into the hotel.
